intro: Korthalsia debilis, commonly known as the slender korthalsia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest undergrowth. Korthalsia debilis is often found in regions with high humidity and well-drained soil.
